magmaCluster.name: Magma Cluster
magmaCluster.pickup: Increases damage with quick successive hits.
magmaCluster.description: Increases damage by <y>1%</c> per hit <c_stack>(+0.5% per stack)</c> up to <y>10% <c_stack>(+5% per stack)</c>. Resets if player does not deal damage for one second.
magmaCluster.story:
hey oli!

i found this cool ass rock at the asteroid belt!!!
i'll probably be on my flight back home as you receive this, but i wanted you to have it. if for whatever reason, we have to part ways, you can remember me by this.
please don't lose it! i love yoooooouuuuu!
shane

gildedRibbon.name: Gilded Ribbon
gildedRibbon.pickup: Increases movement speed briefly after using your mobility skill.
gildedRibbon.description: Increases <y>movement speed</c> by <y>20% <c_stack>(+10% per stack)</c> for <b>1/2 second <c_stack>(+1/6 second per stack)</c> upon using your <y>mobility skill</c>.
gildedRibbon.destination:
421 Concord Ln.
Crown Republic
Planet Ethos
gildedRibbon.story:
We've found an intriguing ribbon at the dig site. It's torn, but curiously, not disheveled in the slightest. Despite its silky, almost transparent appearance, dirt seems to roll right off of it! It's as though it were treated with some sort of hydrophobic spray, except for dust instead of water.
Please do send back testing results from the lab if possible; I'm intrigued to see how this effect was achieved!

spaceRadio.name: Space Radio
spaceRadio.pickup: Chance to create stunning sound waves when landing on ground.
spaceRadio.description: <b>When landing on solid ground,<b> <y>15% <c_stack>(+7% per stack)</c> chance to create a <b>shockwave</c> that <b>stuns enemies for 1/2 second <c_stack>(+1/5 second per stack)</c> dealing <y>100% damage <c_stack>(+25% per stack)</c> where you landed.
spaceRadio.destination:
124 Dreaddock Rd.
Crown Republic
Planet Ethos
spaceRadio.story:
DEAREST CUSTOMER,

As our company, and society, reaches the space age - now more than ever, we are proud of what we have accomplished.

Your hard work has allowed us to reach space - and our profits are at an all time high, thanks to you and your wonderful group of colleagues.

Enclosed is a pocket company radio! Listen to your favorite tunes on the go, or tune into company news at your own discretion.

Best Regards,
Argon Co. Corporate Board

runicEye.name: Eclectic Eye
runicEye.pickup: Secondary skill spawns piercing eyes that hurt nearby enemies.
runicEye.description: <b>Upon using your secondary skill, 3 runic eyes <c_stack>(+1 per stack)</c> will spawn, dealing <r>250% damage <c_stack>(+25% per stack)</c> to a nearby enemy.
runicEye.story:
Dearest acolyte,

Your etching skills left me much to appreciate! I am truly impressed by your mastery of the dark arts...
Enclosed is a token of my gratitude. You may use this to power your constructs. Take care when using this one next to any animals however, as it will attach its power to any and all natural matter that doesn't belong to the one using it.

Best regards,
Your Professor
